headline: U.K. Competition Watchdog Considers Proposed Solutions in Schlumberger's Bid for ChampionX
summary: By Pierre Bertrand The U.K.'s Competition and Markets Authority will consider the measures put forward to assuage competition concerns related to Schlumberger's planned acquisition of ChampionX....
